title: Gerald Celente
content:
Gerald Celente is one of today’s pioneers in trend strategy. <!--more--> He founded the Trends Research Institute in Kingston NY and is the publisher of the Trends Journal that has been in publication since 1980.
He has since been an internationally sought expert by diagnosticians, forecasters and independent and foreign media. Gerald’s insights have been sought for by major networks, PBS and BBC, Russian TV, and publications such as the Economist and major newspapers. The website is TrendsResearch.com
